LanguageData.LetterSCP3199Attack:
A flock of SCP-3199 have appeared.

Contain or kill them.

They will probably leave the area in a few days, leaving a lot of eggs behind.

Don't wait to get rid of the eggs, they will quickly spiral out of control.
LanguageData.LetterSCP939Attack:
A pack of SCP-939 have appeared.

Contain or kill them.

They will probably leave the area in a few days.
LanguageData.LetterContainmentBreach: One or more SCPs are trying to escape containment!\n\nStop their advances or destroy them.
LanguageData.LetterSCP131Join: A pair of SCP-131s, abandoned or lost, have wandered into the area.\n\nThey seem to adore human contact and are joining the colony.
LanguageData.LetterSCP610Local: A few SCP-610 instances formed nearby.
LanguageData.LetterSCP848: A few SCP-848-1s and their webs have grown in the area.
LanguageData.LetterSCP848_SpawnItem: One or more SCP-848-1s caught something in their webs.
LanguageData.LetterSCP2845Attack:
An SCP-2845 and its SCP-2845-1 minions have appeared.

Contain or kill them.

They will probably leave the area in a few days.
LanguageData.SCP113: SCP-113 changed the pawn's gender to
LanguageData.SCP1577: An old-world airplane has arrived and is dropping some resources for you.
LanguageData.SCPES019: just lost a lot of faith in their ideoligion!
LanguageData.MessageSCP1905Spawn: An SCP-1905-1 instance has appeared, and is attacking your colonists!
LanguageData.SCP610ToggleDesc: Stops SCP-610 biome from generating on world map. Requires a new save.
LanguageData.SCP3199ToggleDesc: Stops SCP-3199 from spawning from events, and stops their eggs from hatching.
LanguageData.SCP939ToggleDesc: Stops SCP-939 from spawning from events.
LanguageData.SCP848ToggleDesc: Stops SCP-848 and its webs from spawning, and stops them from finding objects.
LanguageData.SCP3033ToggleDesc: Stops SCP-3033-1 and SCP-3033-2 from spawning.
LanguageData.LetterCISCP3033Raid: The Chaos Insurgency has sent SCP-3033 "Mike" units to assault the colony.\n\nThey are attacking immediately.
LanguageData.LetterCISCP3033RaidFriendly: The Chaos Insurgency has sent SCP-3033 "Mike" units to help you out.
LanguageData.SCR_CSafeDesc: This SCP is fairly easy to contain, and probably can't break out of containment on its own.
LanguageData.SCR_CEuclidDesc: This SCP can probably break out of containment by itself, but advanced containment methods help prevent this.
LanguageData.SCR_CKeterDesc: This SCP is difficult to contain with advanced containment methods, or is resource intensive to do so.
LanguageData.SCR_CThaumielDesc: This SCP contains or helps contain other SCPs.
LanguageData.SCR_CApollyonDesc: This SCP is not containable by any means.
LanguageData.SCR_DDarkDesc: Danger risk is incredibly low, that of no concern, or a danger to only a specific pawn or thing.
LanguageData.SCR_DVlamDesc: A danger to a small group of pawns, has a small range, and/or can be neutralized somewhat easily.
LanguageData.SCR_DKeneqDesc: A danger to a moderate group of pawns, has a moderate range, and probably has a similar difficulty to neutralize.
LanguageData.SCR_DEkhiDesc: A danger to a large group of pawns, potentially worldwide. It spreads quickly and is quite the consuming task to deal with.
LanguageData.SCR_RNoticeDesc: This SCP is pretty much inert. It has little or no effect on the pawns around it.
LanguageData.SCR_RCautionDesc: Mild or moderate effects emanate from this SCP.
LanguageData.SCR_RWarningDesc: Moderate to significant effects emanate from this SCP.
LanguageData.SCR_RDangerDesc: Significant to extreme effects emanate from this SCP.
LanguageData.SCR_RCriticalDesc: Near instant or extremely severe effects are felt from this SCP. Nearby pawns cannot recover from these effects.
